net.stemkoski.bagel

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.Entity
      • net.stemkoski.bagel.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends Entity
    A small rectangular image used in a TileMap.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public double x
        x-coordinate of tile center

      • y

        public double y
        y-coordinate of tile center

      • width

        public double width
        tile width

      • height

        public double height
        tile height

      • tileTextureIndex

        public int tileTextureIndex
        index of texture in list from corresponding TileMap

      • boundary

        public Rectangle boundary
        Full boundary of tile. Used for collision detection, but not for collision resolution, due to "corner snag" or "internal edge" issues that can interfere with Sprite movement

      • edgeLeft

        public Rectangle edgeLeft
        the left edge of the tile, if accessible

      • edgeRight

        public Rectangle edgeRight
        the right edge of the tile, if accessible

      • edgeTop

        public Rectangle edgeTop
        the top edge of the tile, if accessible

      • edgeBottom

        public Rectangle edgeBottom
        the bottom edge of the tile, if accessible

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(double x,
            double y,
            double width,
            double height,
            int tileTextureIndex)
        Set the location, size, and tile image index for this Tile. Automatically sets boundary rectangle; edge data is set by corresponding TileMap.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of tile center
        y - y-coordinate of tile center
        width - tile width
        height - tile height
        tileTextureIndex - index of texture in list from corresponding TileMap
